A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: How could Rey\, after only a couple of days of training and experience in the Star Wars universe\, be as powerful\, or even more so\, than many other jedis\, even considering Yoda? Where did Snoke get his resources? How did he influence Kylo Ren? What was so dangerous about the cave with the mirror? Why did no one tell Poe the plan\, avoiding all the the escape plan deaths? How can Rose fall in love with Finn after 1 day? Too many absurd situations and character developments...
